title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.5 - Sewage-general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.5 - Sewage-general

State Regulations

All sewage, including liquid waste, shall be disposed of
by a public sewerage system or by a sewage disposal system constructed, maintained and operated according to 6 NYCRR Parts
750
-
757. Nonwater-carried
sewage disposal facilities are prohibited, except as permitted by the

Department of Agriculture and Markets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-6.5

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
